title: Tian Ran
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, Buffet, Take-out, Asian, Buddhist
description: Gold Coast vegan restaurant serving Chinese food in a peaceful atmosphere. They cater vegetarian and vegan asian cuisine. Our cooking is free from meat, dairy, alcohol, garlic, onions and MSG. They also have gluten-free menu. All their vegetable "meats" are protein substitutes made from soy, wheat, yam, seaweed and mushroom.
streetAddress: Shop 8, 2464 Gold Coast Hwy, Mermaid Beach
